mapper.select: SELECT BOARDNO, TITLE, B.USERID, U_NAME AS NAME, CONTENT, VIEWCNT, REPLYYN, BOARDKIND, KEYWORDTYPE, B.CDATETIME AS CDATETIME, B.UDATETIME AS UDATETIME FROM mini_db2.T1_BOARD B INNER JOIN mini_db2.T1_USER U ON B.USERID = U.USERID WHERE BOARDNO = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE mini_db2.T1_BOARD SET VIEWCNT = VIEWCNT+1 WHERE BOARDNO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mini_db2.T1_BOARD VALUE (NULL, #{boardKind},#{keywordType},#{userId}, NOW(), NULL,#{title},#{content},0,'N','N')
mapper.update: UPDATE mini_db2.T1_BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, KEYWORDTYPE = #{keywordType}, UDATETIME = NOW() WHERE BOARDNO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT IMGNO, BOARDNO, REPLYNO, IMGSRC, IMGNAME, ORGNAME, IMGTYPE FROM mini_db2.T1_BRDIMG WHERE BOARDNO = #{boardNo}
